trans-unit.source: Enable the checkbox to hide this record in Frontend and mark it as hidden in the Backend
We deliver diffent kinds of marker. Choose one and confirm the following message to switch into another type.

For now we deliver 4 different kinds of Markers. Please select between Point, Range, Route and Area. Maybe you must confirm the message, that the fields will be changed while switching to another type.
A title for better identifying this record in TYPO3 Backend
Insert an address to search for. The map below will set the result as center after pressing "Update"
Type in as much information about the address as you have, to get the best results

Update Press "Update" and the map below will move its center to the best result. All latitude and longitude including the backup fields will be set to this position. After that you can justify the center of the map a little bit by dragging the map with the mouse, if the position have not matched perfectly. Now only the values of latitude and longitude will update. The backup fields will be kept untouched. Reset Press "Reset" to center back the map to the last stored position after pressing "Update". Setting the Default center Maps2 delivers an extension configuration where you can change the default center of the map. Please open the Extensionmanager, choose maps2 and open the configuration.
Search for an address or drag the map manually to update this field. Of cause you can edit this field manually, too.
Search for an address or drag the map manually to update this field. Of cause you can edit this field manually, too.
Pull the center marker on the map to change this field automatically. For sure you can change it manually, too.
Search for an address and press "Update" to update this field. You can't change it, because it saves the position of your last search "Update"
Search for an address and press "Update" to update this field. You can't change it, because it saves the position of your last search "Update"
